All content packaged in this solution is built and supported by the Microsoft Sentinel community. For any support, please create an [issue](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/issues) on the Microsoft Sentinel GitHub repository. **Workbooks:** 12 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
